PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-09582012-06-29,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActShared Services Canada Act
SubjectServices provided by Shared Services Canada Act
PrecisOrder specifying (1) that the Minister designated for the purposes of the Shared Services Canada Act must provide services related to email, data centres and networks with certain exceptions; (2) which departments must obtain these services; and (3) that services can also be provided to other departments and to Crown corporations.
AttachmentsAttachment
